title: Westwood Country Park Walking Route

images.caption: Model aeroplane flying at Westwood Country Park

images.title: Roger May / Storr's Dike Path
images.caption: Storr's Dike Path. The stile from Westwood Lane onto the path alongside Storr's Dike leading to Westwood Bottom.

images.title: Wendy North / We continue along the Barnsley Boundary Walk Trail
images.caption: The Barnsley Boundary Walk Trail on the edge of the park.

description: This pretty country park is located near Wentworth and Rotherham in Yorkshire. In the park you will find miles of woodland walking trails and a waterside path along a small reservoir. The Barnsley Boundary Walk runs through the park so you could pick this up to continue your walking in the area. You could also head a few miles east to Wentworth Woodhouse where you will find miles of walking trails through the parkland and gardens surrounding the large country house.

details.subtitle: Dog Walking
details.content: The woodland trails in the park are ideal for dog walking so expect to see other owners on a fine day.

details.subtitle: Further Information and Other Local Ideas
details.content: Head to the nearby Wharncliffe Woods and Grenoside Woods to extend your walking. There's miles of good walking paths, mountain bike trails and a nature reserve to enjoy here.

display_address: Blackburn Valley Trail, High Green, Ecclesfield, Sheffield, South Yorkshire, England, S35 4DB, United Kingdom
